about_the_game:
Welcome to Reshape,
the ultimate physics-based sandbox design game that offers unparalleled freedom and creativity! Dive into a world where you can pick up, throw, freeze, rotate, and manipulate objects in countless ways, limited only by your imagination.

Key Features:

Limitless Creativity:
With a vast array of items including tables, chairs, beds, flowers, cars, and weapons, Reshape gives you the tools to create anything you can imagine.


Dynamic Physics:
Experience a realistic and dynamic physics engine that allows for endless interactions and creative possibilities.


Interactive Environment:
Explore a fully interactive environment where every object can be manipulated and every action has a reaction.


Sandbox Freedom:
There are no rules or objectives in Reshape – just pure, unadulterated creativity. Build, destroy, or simply experiment to your heart's content.

Reshape offers a universe of possibilities where your creativity knows no bounds. Whether you're a seasoned designer or just looking to unleash your creative side, Reshape is the ultimate playground for your imagination. Start creating today and reshape the world around you!
